Government Tender Announcement
=====================================

**Title:** W684H-240207 – Hangar Doors Maintenance
**Reference Number:** WS4457604185-Doc4457604249
**Publication Date:** February 23, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** March 13, 2024 at 14:00:00

**Solicitation Overview:**
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), invites bids for the provision of all necessary services to perform the inspection, maintenance, and repairs to the manually and electrically operated hangar/blast doors located at 12 Wing Shearwater, HMC Dockyard and CFAD Bedford of CFB Halifax.

**Key Details:**

* **Services Required:** The winning contractor will be responsible for furnishing all labour, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision needed to complete the maintenance and repairs of the specified hangar/blast doors.
* **Contract Period:** The resulting contract will be for a one-year period with an option to extend for an additional two one-year periods.
* **Language:** Bidders may submit documents in either official language of Canada.

**Eligibility and Evaluation Criteria:**

* The contracting authority reserves the right to evaluate bids on either proposed discounts or the original bid prices.
* Only bid submissions that meet the requirements outlined in the solicitation will be considered.

**Bid Submission and Evaluation:**

* Bidders will be evaluated based on the lowest price.
* The solicitation and evaluation process will be conducted in accordance with the Trade Agreement(s) applicable to this procurement.

**Communication and Contracting:**

* All communication and contract-related inquiries should be directed to the Contracting Authority, Sonia Stockman, through sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
* Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful.

**Notice and Solicitation:**

* This solicitation can be accessed online at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18888341?extsite=MTg4ODgzNDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.
* All documents related to this solicitation are available in both English and French.
